languages.text:
Завершив развитие {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} второй ступени, все персонажи получают особый архетип третьей ступени, имеющий уникальный путь развития.
На этом пути персонажи смогут добрать себе {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланты{/g} из первого и второго архетипа, прокачать свои {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g}, получить дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, а также взять пять новых талантов из особого списка.

After completing their second-tier {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, characters gain access to their third-tier archetype, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from the first two previously mastered archetypes, improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} even further, gain additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and select 5 new talents from a special list.
languages.original_text:
После завершения доктрины второй ступени все персонажи получают особую доктрину третьей ступени, имеющую уникальный путь развития.
На этом пути персонажи смогут добрать себе способности и таланты из первой и второй доктрины, прокачать свои характеристики и навыки, получить дополнительные ОД, а также взять пять новых талантов из особого списка.

traits.locale_text:
After completing their second-tier doctrine, characters gain access to their third-tier doctrine, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up any abilities and talents from the first two previously mastered doctrines, improve their characteristics and skills even further, gain additional AP, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

After completing their second-tier doctrine, characters gain access to their third-tier doctrine, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up any abilities and talents from the first two previously mastered doctrines, improve their characteristics and skills even further, gain additional AP, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

After completing their second-tier doctrine, characters gain access to their third-tier doctrine, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more abilities and talents from the first two previously mastered doctrines, improve their characteristics and skills even further, gain additional AP, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

After completing their second-tier {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, characters gain access to their third-tier archetype, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from the first two previously mastered archetypes, improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} even further, gain additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

languages.text: Nach Abschluss ihres zweitrangiges {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g} erhalten Charaktere Zugang zu ihrem drittrangigem Archetyp, die einen einzigartigen Fortschrittspfad besitzt. Dies ist die Gelegenheit, weitere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} von den zwei vorigen gemeisterten Archetypen zu aktivieren, die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} noch weiter zu verbessern, zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zu erhalten und 5 neue Talente aus einer speziellen Liste auszuwählen.
languages.original_text:
After completing their second-tier {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, characters gain access to their third-tier archetype, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from the first two previously mastered archetypes, improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} even further, gain additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

traits.locale_text:
Nach Abschluss ihrer zweitrangigen Doktrin erhalten Charaktere Zugang zu ihrer drittrangigen Doktrin, die einen einzigartigen Fortschrittspfad besitzt.
Dies ist die Gelegenheit, weitere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} von den zwei vorigen gemeisterten Doktrinen zu aktivieren, die Eigenschaften und {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} noch weiter zu verbessern, zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zu erhalten und 5 neue Talente aus einer speziellen Liste auszuwählen.

languages.text: Au terme de l’{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} de deuxième niveau, les personnages accèdent à l’archétype de troisième niveau, qui présente une trajectoire de progression unique. Ils peuvent alors acquérir davantage de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} issus des deux premiers archétypes maîtrisés, améliorer encore leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} et leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g}, bénéficier de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaires et sélectionner 5 nouveaux talents dans une liste spécifique.
languages.original_text:
After completing their second-tier {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, characters gain access to their third-tier archetype, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from the first two previously mastered archetypes, improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} even further, gain additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

traits.locale_text:
Au terme de la doctrine de deuxième niveau, les personnages accèdent à la doctrine de troisième niveau, qui présente une trajectoire de progression unique.
Ils peuvent alors acquérir davantage de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} issus des deux premières doctrines maîtrisées, améliorer encore leurs caractéristiques et leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g}, bénéficier de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaires et sélectionner 5 nouveaux talents dans une liste spécifique.

languages.text:
完成二级职业之后，角色可以获得三级{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}。三级职业拥有独特的升级路线。
三级职业可以从前两级职业之中选择更多{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，进一步提高角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}，获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，还可以从特殊的天赋列表中选择5项新的天赋。
languages.original_text:
After completing their second-tier {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, characters gain access to their third-tier archetype, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from the first two previously mastered archetypes, improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} even further, gain additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

traits.locale_text:
完成二级信条之后，角色可以获得三级信条。三级信条拥有独特的升级路线。
三级信条可以从前两级信条之中选择更多{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，进一步提高角色的属性与{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}，获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，还可以从特殊的天赋列表中选择5项新的天赋。

languages.text:
Al completar el {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} de segunda categoría, los personajes acceden a la tercera categoría, que cuenta con un recorrido de progresión especial.
A través de él, tienen la posibilidad de aprender más {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} de los dos arquetipos anteriores, mejorar aún más sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g}, obtener {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicionales y elegir 5 talentos nuevos de una lista especial.
languages.original_text:
After completing their second-tier {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, characters gain access to their third-tier archetype, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from the first two previously mastered archetypes, improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} even further, gain additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

traits.locale_text:
Al completar la doctrina de segunda categoría, los personajes acceden a la tercera categoría, que cuenta con un recorrido de progresión especial.
A través de él, tienen la posibilidad de aprender más {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} de las dos doctrinas anteriores, mejorar aún más sus características y {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g}, obtener {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicionales y elegir 5 talentos nuevos de una lista especial.

languages.original_text:
After completing a level 2 doctrine, all characters receive a special level 3 doctrine with a unique development path.
On this path, characters will be able to gain abilities and talents from the first and second doctrines, boost their stats and skills, gain additional ODs, and pick up five new talents from a special list.

languages.text:
ティア2の{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}を完了した後に、独自の成長過程を経てティア3のタイプが解放される。
これにより最初の2つの習得済みのタイプから更なる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}を獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}をさらに向上、追加{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を獲得、そしてスペシャルリストから5つの新しいタレントを選ぶことができる。
languages.original_text:
After completing their second-tier {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, characters gain access to their third-tier archetype, which has a unique progression path.
This is their chance to pick up more {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} from the first two previously mastered archetypes, improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} even further, gain additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and select 5 new talents from a special list.

traits.locale_text:
ティア2のドクトリンを完了した後に、独自の成長過程を経てティア3のドクトリンが解放される。
これにより、最初の2つのドクトリンから更なる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}を獲得し、能力や{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}をさらに向上、追加{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を獲得、そしてスペシャルリストから5つの新しいタレントを選ぶことができる。
